metadata.title: CVE-2024-21272 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Vulnerability in the MySQL Connectors product of Oracle MySQL (component:Connector/Python).  Supported versions that are affected are 9.0.0 andprior. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows low privileged attackerwith network access via multiple protocols to compromise MySQL Connectors.Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in takeover of MySQLConnectors. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 7.5 (Confidentiality, Integrity andAvailability impacts).  CVSS Vector:(CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:H/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H).

criterions.comment: mysql-connector-python package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
